skills.name: Rage Gene
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Passive:}} While in {{ci|Gnar|''Mini Gnar''}} form, '''Gnar''' gains '''bonus''' {{sti|ms|{{as|movement speed}}}} and {{sti|attack range|{{as|attack range}}}}.
'''Gnar''' generates ''Rage'' while fighting. At maximum ''Rage'', his next ability will be ''{{cis|Mega Gnar}}'' as he transforms, losing ''Mini Gnar's'' passive effects in exchange for increased stats and new abilities.
description: {{sbc|Innate - Mini Gnar:}} While in '''Mini Gnar''' form, '''Gnar''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{sti|range|'''bonus''' attack range}}, {{sti|{{as|attack speed}}}}, as well as {{as|attack speed growth}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Rage Gene:}} {{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar}} generates {{pp|4;7;11|1 to 11}} ''{{ai|Rage Gene|Gnar|Rage}}'' over 2 seconds upon dealing or receiving [[damage]]. Against non-[[champion]]s, [[basic attack]]s and {{ai|Boomerang Throw|Gnar}} instantly generate{{ft|{{pp|4*0.125;7*0.125;11*0.125|1 to 11|round=false}} ''Rage''.|{{fd|12.5%}} of the amount.}} Against champions, {{ai|Boomerang Throw|Gnar}} instantly generates{{ft|{{pp|4*0.25;7*0.25;11*0.25|1 to 11|round=false}} ''Rage'',|25% of the amount,}}and basic attacks instantly generate{{ft|{{pp|4*0.5;7*0.5;11*0.5|1 to 11|round=false}}.|50% of the amount.}}{{ai|Boomerang Throw|Gnar}} can only generate ''Rage'' once per cast, and grants ''Rage'' based on the first enemy hit. '''Gnar's''' ''Rage'' decays if he has not dealt or taken damage in the last 13 seconds.

Within 4 seconds after reaching maximum ''Rage'', '''Gnar's''' abilities become {{cis|Mega Gnar}}, which will transform '''Gnar''' into {{ci|Mega Gnar}} upon cast. He will also transform after the duration has passed.
{{ci|Mega Gnar}} form lasts for 15 seconds, during which '''Gnar's''' ''Rage'' depletes. Afterwards, '''Gnar''' returns to {{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar}}, retaining his {{sti|health|{{as|'''current''' percentage health}}}} and becoming too [[File:Rage Gene 4.png|20px]] ''tired'' to generate ''Rage'' for 15 seconds.

{{sbc|Innate - Mega Gnar:}} '''Mega Gnar''' has different abilities, although they share '''Mini Gnar's''' ability cooldowns. While in '''Mega Gnar''' form, '''Gnar''' loses all of '''Mini Gnar's''' buffs and instead has increased {{sti|ad|{{as|'''base''' AD}}}}, {{sti|health|{{as|'''base''' health}}}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|'''base''' armor}}}}, and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''base''' magic resistance}}}}. '''Gnar''' [[healing|restores]] {{sti|{{as|health}}}} equal to the increase.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Mini Gnar: While in Mini Gnar form, Gnar gains bonus movement speed, bonus attack range, attack speed, as well as attack speed growth.
Innate - Rage Gene: Mini Gnar generates 1 to 11 ‒ undefined Gnar's Rage over 2 seconds upon dealing or receiving damage. Against non-champions, basic attacks and Gnar's Boomerang Throw instantly generate Against champions, Gnar's Boomerang Throw instantly generatesand basic attacks instantly generateGnar's Boomerang Throw can only generate Rage once per cast, and grants Rage based on the first enemy hit. Gnar's Rage decays if he has not dealt or taken damage in the last 13 seconds.
Within 4 seconds after reaching maximum Rage, Gnar's abilities become Mega Gnar's, which will transform Gnar into Mega Gnar upon cast. He will also transform after the duration has passed.
Mega Gnar form lasts for 15 seconds, during which Gnar's Rage depletes. Afterwards, Gnar returns to Mini Gnar, retaining his current percentage health and becoming too File:Rage Gene 4.png tired to generate Rage for 15 seconds.
Innate - Mega Gnar: Mega Gnar has different abilities, although they share Mini Gnar's ability cooldowns. While in Mega Gnar form, Gnar loses all of Mini Gnar's buffs and instead has increased base AD, base health, base armor, and base magic resistance. Gnar healing health equal to the increase.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Movespeed|{{pp|0 to 14 by 1;14 to 20|formula=0 + 1 per level up to 15, then + 2 per level}}|Total Movespeed|{{pp|335 to 349;351;353;355|formula=334 + 1 per level up to 15, then + 2 per level}}}}{{st|Bonus Range|{{pp|0 to 100}}}}
skills.notes:
* The ''Rage'' generated upon dealing or receiving damage occurs over 2 seconds with 4 ticks every {{fd|0.5}} seconds. It also does not stack but instead refreshes with subsequent applications (of dealing or receiving damage).
* The bonus rage generation on basic attacks counts as an {{tip|on-hit}} effect, and is triggered by {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} and {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}}.
* In-game, the value on the ''Rage'' bar always displays rounded down to the nearest integer.
* {{cis|Mega Gnar}} gained health is not affected by [[healing]] modifiers such as {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} and those from [[item]]s and [[rune]]s.
* When returning to {{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar}}, '''Gnar''' will only retain his current health percentage, not current health total.
** This is intentional to prevent '''Gnar''' from simply triggering {{ai|Rage Gene 3|Gnar|Rage Gene}} in order to heal himself over time.
* '''Gnar's''' abilities share {{sti|cooldowns}} across forms.
* The final stats, after {{ai|Rage Gene 3|Gnar|Rage Gene}} being applied, can be seen on '''Mini Gnar's''' and '''Mega Gnar's''' respective data template, in the [[Gnar|front page]].
** '''Mini Gnar''' gains {{as|{{pp|key=%|5.5+({{ccd|Gnar|as_lvl}}-{{ccd|Mega Gnar|as_lvl}})*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))|formula=5.5 base + {{#expr:{{ccd|Gnar|as_lvl}}-{{ccd|Mega Gnar|as_lvl}}}} growth}}|attack speed}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}.
** '''Mega Gnar''' gains {{as|{{pp|({{ccd|Mega Gnar|hp_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|hp_base}})+({{ccd|Mega Gnar|hp_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|hp_lvl}})*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))|formula={{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|hp_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|hp_base}}}} base + {{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|hp_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|hp_lvl}}}} growth}}|health}} {{as|'''base''' health}}, {{as|{{pp|({{ccd|Mega Gnar|arm_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|arm_base}})+({{ccd|Mega Gnar|arm_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|arm_lvl}})*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))|formula={{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|arm_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|arm_base}}}} base + {{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|arm_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|arm_lvl}}}} growth}}|armor}} {{as|'''base''' armor}}, {{as|{{pp|({{ccd|Mega Gnar|mr_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|mr_base}})+({{ccd|Mega Gnar|mr_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|mr_lvl}})*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))|formula={{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|mr_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|mr_base}}}} base + {{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|mr_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|mr_lvl}}}} growth}}|magic resistance}} {{as|'''base''' magic resistance}}, and {{as|{{pp|({{ccd|Mega Gnar|dam_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|dam_base}})+({{ccd|Mega Gnar|dam_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|dam_lvl}})*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1))|formula={{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|dam_base}}-{{ccd|Gnar|dam_base}}}} base + {{#expr:{{ccd|Mega Gnar|dam_lvl}}-{{ccd|Gnar|dam_lvl}}}} growth}}|attack damage}} {{as|'''base''' attack damage}}

effects.str:
• Bonus Movespeed: 0undefined − 14 by 1;14undefined (based on level)
  • Total Movespeed: 335undefined − 349;351;353;355undefined (based on level)
  • Bonus Range: 0undefined − 100undefined (based on level)

skills.name: Boomerang Throw
skills.range: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|1125|Outgoing missile}} / {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|3000|Return missile, from the return location}}
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar}} throws a boomerang in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies hit. The boomerang then flies backward after hitting an enemy or reaching max range, dealing reduced damage.
'''Gnar''' can catch the boomerang, which {{sti|ah|reduces}} the cooldown.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gnar''' throws a boomerang in a line in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in its path and {{tip|slow|slows}} them for 2 seconds. The boomerang returns towards '''Gnar''' in a fixed line after reaching its maximum range or hitting an enemy, dealing 50% damage to subsequent targets.
Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang while it is returning back refunds 40% of the ability's {{sti|cooldown|'''maximum''' cooldown}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gnar throws a boomerang in a line in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies in its path and slows them for 2 seconds. The boomerang returns towards Gnar in a fixed line after reaching its maximum range or hitting an enemy, dealing 50% damage to subsequent targets.
Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang while it is returning back refunds 40% of the ability's maximum cooldown.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|5 to 165}} {{as|(+ 115% AD)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|5/2 to 165/2}} {{as|(+ {{fd|57.5}}% AD)}}}}{{st|Slow|{{ap|15 to 35}}%}}
skills.notes:
* The boomerang return direction is determined by which direction '''Gnar''' is heading, and is calculated at the apex of its flight.
* Since the cooldown between the two is shared, ''Mini Gnar'' may pick up a {{tt|boulder|refunding 70% of the maximum cooldown time of ''Boomerang Throw''}} and/or ''Mega Gnar'' may catch a {{tt|boomerang|refunding 40% of the maximum cooldown time of ''Boulder Toss''}}.
* ''Boomerang Throw'' will fire from wherever '''Gnar''' was at the start of the cast time.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 115% AD)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ 57.5% AD)
  • Slow: %

skills.name: Boulder Toss
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Mega Gnar}} throws a boulder in the target direction that stops upon the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies {{tip|slow|slowing}} them.
'''Mega Gnar''' can retrieve the boulder, which {{sti|ah|reduces}} the cooldown.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gnar''' throws a boulder in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies upon impact and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds. The boulder then remains on the ground for 6 seconds.
After {{fd|0.3}} seconds, '''Gnar''' can pick up the boulder by moving within 90 units of it, refunding 70% of the ability's {{sti|cooldown|'''maximum''' cooldown}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gnar throws a boulder in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies upon impact and slowing them for 2 seconds. The boulder then remains on the ground for 6 seconds.
After 0.3 seconds, Gnar can pick up the boulder by moving within 90 units of it, refunding 70% of the ability's maximum cooldown.
skills.notes:
* Since the cooldown between the two is shared ''Mini Gnar'' may pick up a {{tt|boulder|refunding 70% of the maximum cooldown time of ''Boomerang Throw''}} and/or ''Mega Gnar'' may catch a {{tt|boomerang|refunding 40% of the maximum cooldown time of ''Boulder Toss''}}.
* The {{ai|Boulder Toss|Gnar|Boulder}} will still drop to the ground if colliding with {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 140% AD)
  • Slow: %

skills.name: Hyper
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Passive:}} {{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar's}} basic attacks and damaging abilities apply stacks. The third stack deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} based on the {{as|target's '''maximum''' health}}, and grants a burst of {{sti|ms|{{as|movement speed}}}} to '''Gnar'''.
'''Gnar''' will gain the {{as|movement speed}} upon {{ai|Rage Gene|Gnar|transforming}} back to {{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar}}.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Gnar's''' [[basic attack]]s and [[champion ability|abilities]] apply a [[stack]] of ''Hyper'' to affected enemies for {{fd|3.5}} seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing upon applying the second stack.

Upon applying 3 stacks to a target, the stacks are consumed to deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} and grant '''Gnar''' {{pp|type = [[File:GNAR!.png|20px|border]] GNAR!'s rank|key=%|20 to 80 for 4|0 to 3|formula = 20% + 20% per GNAR!'s rank|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over 3 seconds. The damage is capped at 300 {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
'''Gnar''' gains ''Hyper's'' {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when he leaves {{ci|Mega Gnar|Mega}} form.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Gnar's basic attacks and champion ability apply a stack of Hyper to affected enemies for 3.5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing upon applying the second stack.
Upon applying 3 stacks to a target, the stacks are consumed to deal bonus magic damage and grant Gnar 0 to 3 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds. The damage is capped at 300 (+ 100% AP) against monsters.
Gnar gains Hyper's bonus movement speed when he leaves Mega form.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|0 to 40}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6 to 14}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
skills.notes: * The bonus movement speed's duration refreshes whenever '''Gnar''' would receive it (by hitting a target three times again).

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ % of target's maximum health) (+ 100% AP)

st_slices: (+ % of target's maximum health) (+ 100% AP)

skills.name: Wallop
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Mega Gnar}} slams his arm down in an area toward the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} enemies within.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gnar''' slams his arm down in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck within the area and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Gnar slams his arm down in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies struck within the area and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

skills.name: Hop
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar}} {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target location and bounces off of any unit he lands on, {{tip|dash|leaping}} forth again without a bounce. He also gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for a few seconds.
Bouncing off an enemy will {{tip|slow}} them, dealing {{as|physical damage}} based on the {{as|target's '''maximum''' health}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gnar''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target location, and upon arrival gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 6 seconds.
If '''Gnar''' lands on a unit he will {{tip|dash|bounce}} 500 units further in the same direction.
Landing on an enemy deals them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 80% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''Gnar''' will not bounce if he is {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} during the first leap.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gnar leaps to the target location, and upon arrival gains bonus attack speed for 6 seconds.
If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce 500 units further in the same direction.
Landing on an enemy deals them physical damage and slows them by 80% for 0.5 seconds.
Gnar will not bounce if he is immobilized during the first leap.
skills.notes: * ''Hop'' does not allow '''Gnar''' to bounce off wards.

skills.name: Crunch
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Mega Gnar}} {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target location, {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies he lands on and dealing {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies based on each {{as|target's '''maximum''' health}}.
If ''Crunch'' is used to {{ai|Rage Gene|Gnar|transform}}, ''Gnar'' will {{tip|dash|bounce}} as per ''{{ai|Hop|Gnar}}''.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gnar''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} to the target location and deals {{as|physical damage}} to nearby enemies upon impact. After a {{fd|0.25}}-second delay, additional enemies in a larger radius also take the same damage.

If ''Crunch'' is used to transform, '''Gnar''' will still be able to {{tip|dash|bounce}} as per {{ai|Hop|Gnar}}. ''Crunch's'' area of effect is dealt in both areas, though enemies can only be damaged once.
Enemies '''Gnar''' lands directly on top of are affected by ''Hop's'' {{tip|slow}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gnar leaps to the target location and deals physical damage to nearby enemies upon impact. After a 0.25-second delay, additional enemies in a larger radius also take the same damage.
If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to bounce as per Gnar's Hop. Crunch's area of effect is dealt in both areas, though enemies can only be damaged once.
Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are affected by Hop's slow.
skills.notes: * '''Gnar''' is locked out of using any other abilities during ''Crunch'', but he can still transform mid-air if he reaches 100 ''{{ai|Rage Gene|Gnar|Rage}}'' during the {{tip|dash|jump}} of {{ai|Hop|Gnar}}.

skills.name: GNAR!
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Passive:}} {{ais|Hyper|Gnar}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} is increased.
{{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Mega Gnar}} throws enemies around him in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them upon landing.
description: {{sbc|{{ci|Gnar|Mini Gnar}} - Passive:}}{{ais|Hyper|Gnar}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} is increased.

{{sbc|{{ci|Mega Gnar}} - Active:}} '''Gnar''' thrusts his arms in the target direction, {{tip|airborne|knocking away}} nearby enemies up to 590 units in that direction and afterwards dealing them {{as|physical damage}}, as well as {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 45% after a {{fd|0.4}}-second delay.
Enemies that collide with terrain take {{ccs|50% increased damage|physical}} instantly and are {{tip|stun|stunned}} instead of {{tip|slow|slowed}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Mini Gnar - Passive:Gnar's Hyper bonus movement speed is increased.
Mega Gnar - Active: Gnar thrusts his arms in the target direction, knocking away nearby enemies up to 590 units in that direction and afterwards dealing them physical damage, as well as slowing them by 45% after a 0.4-second delay.
Enemies that collide with terrain take Unknown value: ccs / 50% increased damage / physical instantly and are stunned instead of slowed.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Increased Damage|{{ap|200*1.5 to 400*1.5}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 100% AP)
  • Increased Damage: (+ 75% bonus AD) (+ 150% AP)
